attributes.action: Limit Council Tax rises to the same rate of inflation used to calculate increases in pensions and other state benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year, the local councils consistently increase spending way above the rate of inflation. This profligacy presents very real hardship to pensioners, others on fixed incomes and other recipients of state benefts. The councils should be forced to limit their spending increases to the government's officially published inflation rate.

government_responses.details:
